summary: Delete chunks from the vector store
description: Delete chunks based on metadata filters or AST-based filter expressions

metadata_filter.description: Metadata filter for deletion. Supports: $eq, $in, $range, $gte, $lte, $gt, $lt for scalar and array fields. uuid can be used as a filter field. If not provided, all records will be deleted (dangerous).

ast_filter.description: AST-based filter expression for advanced deletion. Provides structured query language with operators like AND, OR, NOT, comparison operators, and field-specific filters. Example: {"operator": "AND", "left": {"field": "category", "operator": "=", "value": "test"}, "right": {"field": "language", "operator": "=", "value": "en"}}
